description: The French manager sued Cantona for suggesting his Euro 2016 squad selection was racially motivated.
title: Deschamps defamation case against Cantona ruled void
title_page: Deschamps defamation case against Cantona ruled void - BBC News
maintext: "But Deschamps, he has a really French name. Maybe he is the only one in France to have a truly French name," the former Manchester United striker said.
